WorkItem.Description:
Dodge and Parry calculations seem off. Comparing stats as shown on wowarmory to avoidance calcs in rawr are not consistant nor equal. an example being Ærron of uldum.
dodge: 11.89%           Rawr calcs: 12.31%
parry:   11.66%           Rawr calcs: 14.23%
 
Caress of sen'jin
dodge: 13.54%           Rawr calcs: 12.53%
parry:   14.46%           Rawr calcs: 15.15%

Comments.Message:
Please follow the posting guidelines, by attaching character files.

Additionally, note that the values you see on the armory should not match what you see in Rawr, as the armory shows avoidance against level 85s, whereas Rawr will show avoidance against bosses (typically). There should be a difference of ~0.6%. That doesn't explain most of these differences though.

Sorry for not following the guidelines properly.

These are directly pulled from battle.net using rawr v4.0.16 with no modifications.

Also why would avoidance numbers be lower against lvl 85 mobs vs lvl 88?

This is Caress.

I can also give in game numbers as required.
Yup... Agreed.  I was noticing the discrepancies as well as I was going through my validation pass to fine-tune the Tank numbers.  Just hadn't written up a defect yet.  Thank you.
